title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 65-1.6 - Deductibles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 65-1.6 - Deductibles

State Regulations

Each insurance company which offers insurance policies to satisfy the minimum requirements of article 51 shall offer the policy prescribed in this Subpart with a family deductible of $200 and without any deductible. Each insurance company may also offer the above policy with a family deductible of $100. Any family deductible shall apply to the "named insured" and any "relative", as these terms are defined in the Mandatory Personal Injury Protection Endorsement set forth in this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
65-1.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
